name: Bloob juice
description: My friend asked me to clone some B & M eliquid for him and this is what came out. It was surprisingly good and he said it was spot on.
author: Smoky

reviews.text: I enjoyed this recipe as it was different. Weird combination of flavors that work well together.

I really like this one, i played with the %'s a couple times, but settled on right where you had 'em, its a good mix to have in order to mix things up. I would never have thought of mixing the banana and blueberry together, but magically it goes quite well. thanks again!
